description: This file defines a custom Select component built using React, radix-ui primitives, and lucide icons. It encapsulates various subcomponents such as trigger, content, label, item, separator, and scroll buttons, styling and wiring them together for a styled, accessible dropdown select UI.

methods.name: SelectTrigger
methods.description: A styled trigger button for the select menu, forwarding refs and handling props.

methods.name: SelectScrollUpButton
methods.description: A button to scroll up in the select menu, with an upward chevron icon.

methods.name: SelectScrollDownButton
methods.description: A button to scroll down in the select menu, with a downward chevron icon.

methods.name: SelectContent
methods.description: The container for the dropdown menu content, managing portal rendering and animation.

methods.name: SelectLabel
methods.description: Label component for groups of select items.

methods.name: SelectItem
methods.description: An individual selectable item within the dropdown, suited for selection list.

methods.name: SelectSeparator
methods.description: A separator line used within the dropdown menu to divide items.
